page.title: 13GR.Tanners Dairy Retail Shop
page.content: Tanners' Dairy in Little Shelford has been running for over 40 years and delivers to Little Shelford,Great Shelford and Stapleford. They do not have their own cows, however they have a bottling station in Headingham.The station sends the milk(bottled)which is stored in crates,to them from Headingha The bottles of milk are kept cool and fresh in giant refrigerators,they have 3 of these. They employ 20 men to work on the dairy,some of which drive the milk floats.On their rounds they sell milk, fizzy drinks,and fruit juices. In the shop at the dairy they not only sell dairy products (such as cheese and milk)but,frozen produce and fresh fruit as well.
